name_original: Rise and Grind (RogueCaves Studio, Maggie the Writing Gremlin, thepixelpuncher, stussy446, Dr.MedicTM)
description:
Play as Barista Sam!

Sam just wants a job where she isn’t berated by entitled customers and dealing with bad managers every day. Deal with rude customers by throwing coffee items at them. Jump on beans to boost your way to the top. Don't forget to grab your coffee to increase your score!

Playtesters have said

“I'm playin!!!!!!!!!! I'm jamming to the soundtrack hahaha”

“Fun! Challenging! I wanted more chances to beat the boss XD”

“My thumbs are tired already! Had fun playing it”

“It was fun! I enjoyed the gameplay of bouncing on the beans.”

“I liked it! I like vertical platformers when I play platformers (I am very bad at platformers though)”

If you support our game, we donate the money to Solidarity Fund by coworker!

Check out our linktr.ee to learn more: https://linktr.ee/riseandgrndgame
